description.gold-silver:
Blinds the foe to
reduce accuracy.

Blinds the foe to
reduce accuracy.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Looses a powerful blast of
light that cuts accuracy.
description.emerald:
Looses a powerful blast of
light that cuts accuracy.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A blast of light
that cuts the foe’s
accuracy. It also
illuminates caves.

light that cuts the
foe’s accuracy.
It can also be used
to illuminate caves.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
